text: Cheongwadae (; Hanja: ; literally "pavilion of blue tiles"),Romanization by the official website: english.president.go.kr also known as the Blue House, was the executive office and official residence of the President of the Republic of Korea until 2022. It is located in Jongno-gu of the capital Seoul. The Blue House is the most protected official residence in Asia. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in South Korea
title: Blue House
